Dialogs.00000C78;00000045: Everyone's taking a bath right now, so I'll wait until they come out.

Dialogs.00000CCA;00000049: Everyone's gone to the bath right now, so I'll wait until they come back.

Dialogs.00000D6B;00000052: "Oh, no... I forgot to lock up the kitchen. I have to lock the windows as well..."

Dialogs.00000ED9;00000039: "...N-No way...... I don't like those kinds of things..."

Dialogs.00000F6E;00000037: "Ugh... I wish they'd build a bathroom upstairs too..."

Dialogs.00000FC4;0000003A: "Oh well. Since I'm down here, I'll get some cold milk..."

Dialogs.0000101D;00000034: "Oh... Someone's in the dining room. Is it Me-chan?"

Dialogs.00001190;0000003F: "I swear! I saw it. A ghost dressed in white with long hair..."

Dialogs.0000123D;00000032: "But... There are two witnesses, Mena and Lucy..."

Dialogs.000012CD;00000036: "Yeah, that was real. I'm sorry for doubting Me-chan."

Dialogs.0000132F;00000039: "...All right. I will look around here starting tonight."

Dialogs.00001388;0000004D: "Yes... Please. I think Aoi- san is best suited if it has to do with ghosts."

Dialogs.00001466;00000036: "Benjamin-sama... A pot was sent here this afternoon."

Dialogs.000014D3;00000035: "Oh, it's finally here? Put that in the living room."

Dialogs.00001521;00000029: "Oh. What kind of a pot is that anyways?"

Dialogs.0000156D;00000030: "...A commoner like you would never understand."

Dialogs.000015C0;00000046: "It is said to be snuck out of the treasury when a royal family fell."

Dialogs.00001651;00000033: "...It is said to be worth at least a million Zel."

Dialogs.000016DB;0000004E: "I bought that for only 10,000 Zel. You have to admire my bargaining ability."

Dialogs.00001838;00000027: "You go in there and act like a ghost."

Dialogs.000018B6;00000042: "If they're pretending to have a ghost, we'll go along with them."

Dialogs.0000191B;00000034: "It'll be a good excuse to buy that land for cheap."

Dialogs.00001972;00000034: "But... We can't buy the land unless they move out."

Dialogs.000019C9;00000061: "That's why I'm telling you to cause a commotion to get them to move out. Do you not understand?"

Dialogs.00001B27;0000003A: "Oh man... I don't know what I'll do if I see it again..."

Dialogs.00001B77;00000022: "But I have to check the locks..."

Dialogs.00001BD1;00000053: "Hmm... I think I checked everything over there. All that's left is the kitchen..."

Dialogs.00001D7B;00000029: "But I can't help it if he ordered me..."

Dialogs.00001E2B;00000038: "All right! We'll send it to heaven for sure this time!"

Dialogs.00001E85;00000027: "Crap! They'll find me if I stay here!"

Dialogs.00001EEA;00000025: "I-I have to find a place to hide..."

Dialogs.00001F8B;00000043: "B-But I heard a strange voice like a frog being stomped by a cow."

Dialogs.00001FEE;0000001F: "That's a scary way to put it."

Dialogs.00002089;00000062: "Phew, that was close. I never thought there'll be a stairs leading to a basement in the kitchen."

Dialogs.00002145;00000035: "Well... I have to hide here until things calm down."

Dialogs.000022B3;00000027: "Hmm... I don't see any ghosts around."

Dialogs.0000239A;00000051: The man that came out of the basement runs out of the Academy with amazing speed.

Dialogs.00002442;00000034: "What was that? Isn't that the servant of Benjamin?"

Dialogs.0000249A;00000029: "Then was all the ghost stuff his doing?"

Dialogs.00002527;00000036: "Well, I guess ghosts are always explained like this."

Dialogs.000028A5;00000025: "Kyaa! I hate ghosts!! Where is it!?"

Dialogs.0000298D;00000034: "So you are the long-haired ghost dressed in white."

Dialogs.000029DF;0000005E: "Oh, I forgot to introduce myself. My name's Sheryl Winzer. Please give me your best regards."

Dialogs.00002A5C;00000023: "Oh, that is very polite of you..."

Dialogs.00002A9E;00000048: "No!!! This is no world for a ghost to be in!! Go to heaven right away!"

Dialogs.00002B07;0000001F: "But I don't know how I can..."

Dialogs.00002B77;0000004F: "God of heavens... please lend me your powers to purify this wandering spirit!"

Dialogs.00002C30;00000040: "It can't be...! God of heavens, please lend me your powers...!"

Dialogs.00002C77;0000004B: No matter how many times she tried, the miracle of God does not come forth.

Dialogs.00002DDF;0000004D: "Well... Even if she's a ghost, it doesn't seem like she'll do anything bad."

Dialogs.00002E4C;00000024: "Isn't an Academy with a ghost fun?"

Dialogs.00002EBF;00000043: "T-That's ridiculous!! Are you telling me to leave this ghost be!?"

Dialogs.00002F22;00000031: "Isn't it better for you too to have her around?"

Dialogs.00002FD4;0000003E: "Well... We do have spare rooms, so you're welcome to use it."

Dialogs.00003078;00000033: "Sigh... I do not think a ghost would need a room."

Dialogs.000030F3;0000004C: "...Your name's Sheryl, right? I'll call you Sherry. You don't mind, right?"

Dialogs.00003160;0000002F: "Not at all. Please give me your best regards."

Dialogs.0000319A;0000002B: ...And a strange ghost joins the Academy...

Dialogs.000032D8;0000001F: Mena comes in through the door.

Dialogs.0000334B;00000025: "Um... Can I sleep with you tonight?"

Dialogs.000033B9;00000029: "Um... A ghost might appear again, so..."

Dialogs.00003438;0000002D: "Thanks... I was so scared I couldn't sleep."

Dialogs.000034B1;0000002B: "Fufu... This reminds me of the old times."

Dialogs.000034F3;0000003E: "Yeah. How many years has it been since we've slept together?"

Dialogs.00003547;0000004A: "We were really small... but I don't think it was more than 10 years ago."

Dialogs.000035A8;00000034: "Wait... You came to me even after you've grown up."

Dialogs.000035F3;00000055: "We got separate rooms after we grew up, but you kept on coming to my room at night."

Dialogs.0000365E;0000006A: "Well... We were sleeping together for so long, so it didn't click when I was told to sleep separately..."

Dialogs.0000370D;00000053: "I think it started when my mom and dad died and when I was at a relative's place."

Dialogs.00003777;00000049: "Oh yeah... And Dad went to pick you up a bit after he came back, right?"

Dialogs.000037D6;00000028: "It was actually more than half a year."

Dialogs.00003815;00000042: "It couldn't be helped. Dad didn't come back often from his work."

Dialogs.0000388D;0000003E: "I thought you'd come into my bed again when you came back..."

Dialogs.000038E1;00000043: "Well... I'll tell you now, but you looked older when I saw you..."

Dialogs.00003959;00000031: "Yeah... So I was embarrassed to act like a kid."

Dialogs.000039A1;00000041: "Oh... That's why you acted a bit cold when you first came back."

Dialogs.00003A24;00000067: "Well, it wasn't strange... but you started cleaning and cooking when you used to always be with me..."

Dialogs.00003AA1;0000005E: "I learned it at my relative's. I thought you might leave me if I didn't do something useful."

Dialogs.00003B42;0000002C: "Yeah... but I was really scared back then."

Dialogs.00003B84;0000003D: "You didn't stop me even when I went to my relative's place."

Dialogs.00003BD8;00000046: "Well, I couldn't stop you, because you weren't there when I noticed."

Dialogs.00003C25;00000029: I can't tell her that I cried after that.

Dialogs.00003C85;00000050: "But since we couldn't cook at all, we were happy that you were cooking for us."

Dialogs.00003CEB;00000056: "I was happy when you two were happy because it made me feel like I could stay there."

Dialogs.00003D77;0000002B: "I'm also happy they like my cooking here."

Dialogs.00003DC9;00000025: We keep talking about our memories...

Dialogs.00003E22;0000002F: And now, Mena's sleeping, clinging onto my arm.

Dialogs.00003E67;0000002B: "It really calms me down when I do this..."

Dialogs.00003E99;00000037: That's the last thing she said before Mena fell asleep.

Dialogs.00003EF4;00000027: Mena wiggles a bit from time to time...

Dialogs.00003F1E;0000002D: Each time, I feel something soft on my arm...

Dialogs.00004018;0000002A: （Now... I'm the one that can't sleep...）

Dialogs.000040A1;00000029: It's already morning when I open my eyes.

Dialogs.000041F5;0000003A: "...Thanks for yesterday. I was able to sleep peacefully."

Dialogs.000042B3;0000001D: Mena runs to the dining room.

Dialogs.000042D3;00000024: Well, I should get up and get ready.

Dialogs.00004327;00000022: I yawn and slowly start to change.

Dialogs.00004407;00000025: "Huh? You guys are back early today."

Dialogs.0000444A;00000041: "The public bath was closed today. I heard it is an emergency..."

Dialogs.000044B7;0000003C: "Oh yeah... Hanna-san was saying slimes came into the bath."

Dialogs.00004513;00000034: "I got the job this afternoon to beat those slimes."

Dialogs.0000459E;0000002A: "We couldn't take a bath because of that!"

Dialogs.00004612;0000003F: "We would have beat them in the afternoon if we knew about it."

Dialogs.00004671;0000005C: "It can't be helped... I guess we'll have to use our small bath until we beat those slimes."

Dialogs.000046D4;00000020: It seems everyone's angry at me.

Dialogs.00004742;0000002D: "I could not tell what was going on, though."

Dialogs.0000478F;0000004B: "It can't be helped. I guess we'll have to use our small bath for a while."

Dialogs.000047F9;00000028: "Yeah... I hope they'll reopen it soon."
